roleset.name: put into danger

example.name: passive
example.text: It is possible then that Santa Fe's real estate -- even in [a state]-1 imperiled *trace*-1 by earthquakes -- could, one day, fetch a king's ransom.

roleset.note: IMPERIL-V NOTES: If we see any examples with both agent and instrument, arg0 will haveto be split into arg0 'agent' and arg2 'instrument' and all sentenceswill have to make the distinction. Otherwise let's not. (from imperil.01-v)
